rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Very structured and clear-cut class. Xiaoming is a wonderful person and she teaches the material very well. I'd highly recommend for students to take this class whether they are interested in geology or just trying to fulfill a Gen-Ed. Take caution though- you will have to study the lecture slides hard to get an A.
Extremely sweet and helpful woman! I took the class for the mandatory science credit and was dreading it and she has made the class enjoyable and bearable. Wonderful lady!
